name.ja: <ruby>Ｓ－Ｆｏｒｃｅ<rt>セキュリティ・フォース</rt></ruby> ナイトチェイサー

text.en:
1 non-Link "S-Force" monster
Each of your opponent's monsters in the same column as one of your "S-Force" monsters cannot target monsters in its same column for attacks. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "S-Force" monster you control; shuffle it into the Deck, then you can Special Summon 1 of your banished "S-Force" monsters. You can only use this effect of "S-Force Nightchaser" once per turn.
